title: Can't find region transfer under account bottom
body: I was trying to transfer region tonight, but tansfer option didn't exist in my store. It supposed to be included in the account option beside 'purchase RP' buttom. Has anyone seen this issue before?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Region transfers from OCE to other regions are currently disabled, for more information see the below linked thread.
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/f6bvYNQx-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st

Yes i have the same issue now.
i have to transfer my account to jp though, i can't find any regions in that option
https://gyazo.com/cba6c5fa4c9a8d71a10e4a01d4dc8958
